<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WebAssemblyTargetLowering::isLegalAddressingMode(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/msp430/lib/target/msp430/disassembler/msp430disassembler-cpp/#abf132b4ad93f3557cd3956577592ba68">AddrMode</a> &amp;AM,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WebAssembly offsets are added as unsigned without wrapping. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// isLegalAddressingMode gives us no way to determine if wrapping could be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// happening, so we approximate this by accepting only non-negative offsets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AM.BaseOffs &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Everything else is legal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WebAssemblyTargetLowering::allowsMisalignedMemoryAccesses(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;VT&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;AddrSpace&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Align&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dd">MachineMemOperand::Flags</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Flags&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cabc8e2ee40a84687a9e12fd08784b87ba">Fast</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WebAssembly supports unaligned accesses, though it should be declared</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with the p2align attribute on loads and stores which do so, and there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may be a performance impact. We tell LLVM they&#39;re &quot;fast&quot; because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for the kinds of things that LLVM uses this for (merging adjacent stores</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of constants, etc.), WebAssembly implementations will either want the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unaligned access or they&#39;ll split anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cabc8e2ee40a84687a9e12fd08784b87ba">Fast</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cabc8e2ee40a84687a9e12fd08784b87ba">Fast</a> = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WebAssemblyTargetLowering::shouldSimplifyDemandedVectorElts(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetLoweringOpt &amp;TLO)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ISel process runs DAGCombiner after legalization; this step is called</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SelectionDAG optimization phase. This post-legalization combining process</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// runs DAGCombiner on each node, and if there was a change to be made,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// re-runs legalization again on it and its user nodes to make sure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// everythiing is in a legalized state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The legalization calls lowering routines, and we do our custom lowering for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// build&#95;vectors (LowerBUILD&#95;VECTOR), which converts undef vector elements</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into zeros. But there is a set of routines in DAGCombiner that turns unused</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (= not demanded) nodes into undef, among which SimplifyDemandedVectorElts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// turns unused vector elements into undefs. But this routine does not work</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with our custom LowerBUILD&#95;VECTOR, which turns undefs into zeros. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// combination can result in a infinite loop, in which undefs are converted to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zeros in legalization and back to undefs in combining.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So after DAG is legalized, we prevent SimplifyDemandedVectorElts from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// running for build&#95;vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aff6f73b624fecca7dbe94259f9437e32">ISD::BUILD&#95;VECTOR</a> &amp;&amp; TLO.LegalOps &amp;&amp; TLO.LegalTys)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Values may need to be fixed so that they will sign extend to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// within the expected range during ISel. Check whether the value is in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bounds based on the lane bit width and if it is out of bounds, lop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// off the extra bits and subtract 2^n to reflect giving the high bit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value -2^(n-1) rather than +2^(n-1). Skip the i64 case because it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot possibly be out of range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#a33cca915c8026e43ecc98a96089a6b86a78523d34068fb7d8996627878dd5ba19">Const</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(Lane.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="normal">        int64&#95;t Val = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#a33cca915c8026e43ecc98a96089a6b86a78523d34068fb7d8996627878dd5ba19">Const</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#a33cca915c8026e43ecc98a96089a6b86a78523d34068fb7d8996627878dd5ba19">Const</a>-&gt;getSExtValue() : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t LaneBits = 128 / Lanes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((LaneBits == 64 || Val &gt;= -(1ll &lt;&lt; (LaneBits - 1))) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected out of bounds negative value&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Const &amp;&amp; LaneBits != 64 &amp;&amp; Val &gt; (1ll &lt;&lt; (LaneBits - 1)) - 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="normal">          uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = (1ll &lt;&lt; LaneBits) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewVal = (((uint64&#95;t)Val &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>) - (1ll &lt;&lt; LaneBits)) &amp; Mask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><Highlight kind="normal">          ConstLanes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(NewVal, SDLoc(Lane), LaneT));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M : Mask) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = 0; J &lt; LaneBytes; ++J) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lower undefs (represented by -1 in mask) to &#123;0..J&#125;, which use a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whole lane of vector input, to allow further reduction at VM. E.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// match an 8x16 byte shuffle to an equivalent cheaper 32x4 shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t ByteIndex = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> == -1 ? J : (uint64&#95;t)M &#42; LaneBytes + J;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>&#91;OpIdx++&#93; = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a7d26e2f2179b5a8a53381f8046e9d117">getConstant</a>(ByteIndex, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2552"><Highlight kind="normal">  SDLoc <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2553"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The legalizer does not know how to expand the unsupported comparison modes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper to extract VectorWidth bits from Vec, starting from IdxVal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921" lineLink="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Vec, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IdxVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorWidth) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a6b2b8ca5b0fdf6484247d5ae74deb9ff">getValueType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ElVT = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Factor = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() / VectorWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ResultVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(&#42;DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#adecf615928faed0c8a082ffdb65dfea0">getContext</a>(), ElVT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>() / Factor);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract the relevant VectorWidth bits.  Generate an EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ElemsPerChunk = VectorWidth / ElVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(ElemsPerChunk) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Elements per chunk not power of 2&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the index of the first element of the VectorWidth-bit chunk</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we want. Since ElemsPerChunk is a power of 2 just need to clear bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><Highlight kind="normal">  IdxVal &amp;= ~(ElemsPerChunk - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the input is a buildvector just emit a smaller one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aff6f73b624fecca7dbe94259f9437e32">ISD::BUILD&#95;VECTOR</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a5d154312bef0ed1a6bacfcb52b7cf8eb">getBuildVector</a>(ResultVT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><Highlight kind="normal">                              Vec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a0cdd5176dc41b96586448ecc59770250">ops</a>().slice(IdxVal, ElemsPerChunk));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VecIdx = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ab85f5fcb2f3bb0aaf83041a41182a2d4">getIntPtrConstant</a>(IdxVal, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9070de8a5c5b71851732c4c54e2ffedf">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, ResultVT, Vec, VecIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper to recursively truncate vector elements in half with NARROW&#95;U. DstVT</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is the expected destination value type after recursion. In is the initial</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// input. Note that the input should have enough leading zero bits to prevent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NARROW&#95;U from saturating results.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950" lineLink="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> DstVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> In, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SrcVT = In.getValueType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No truncation required, we might get here due to recursive calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcVT == DstVT)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> In;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2957"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcSizeInBits = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElems = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2960"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElems))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2961"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2962"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>() == NumElems &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Illegal truncation&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2963"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcSizeInBits &gt; DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Illegal truncation&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2964"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2965"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = &#42;DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#adecf615928faed0c8a082ffdb65dfea0">getContext</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2966"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> PackedSVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a752372e170e4e7c595bf8810bb52adf2">EVT::getIntegerVT</a>(Ctx, SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() / 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2967"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2968"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Narrow to the largest type possible:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2969"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vXi64/vXi32 -&gt; i16x8.narrow&#95;i32x4&#95;u and vXi16 -&gt; i8x16.narrow&#95;i16x8&#95;u.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2970"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> InVT = MVT::i16, OutVT = MVT::i8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2971"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() &gt; 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2972"><Highlight kind="normal">    InVT = MVT::i32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2973"><Highlight kind="normal">    OutVT = MVT::i16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2974"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2975"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SubSizeInBits = SrcSizeInBits / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2976"><Highlight kind="normal">  InVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, InVT, SubSizeInBits / InVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2977"><Highlight kind="normal">  OutVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, OutVT, SubSizeInBits / OutVT.getSizeInBits());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2978"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2979"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split lower/upper subvectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2980"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(In, 0, DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SubSizeInBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2981"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(In, NumElems / 2, DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SubSizeInBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2982"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 256bit -&gt; 128bit truncate - Narrow lower/upper 128-bit subvectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2984"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#aacd05b71fb3b325dcc53a7df09d37edb">is256BitVector</a>() &amp;&amp; DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a6db1f207286bd8bc6a978593a55955e9">is128BitVector</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2985"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(InVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2986"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(InVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2987"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(WebAssemblyISD::NARROW&#95;U, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, OutVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2988"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(DstVT, Res);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2989"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2990"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2991"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recursively narrow lower/upper subvectors, concat result and narrow again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2992"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> PackedVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, PackedSVT, NumElems / 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2993"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, DAG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2994"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, DAG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2995"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2996"><Highlight kind="normal">  PackedVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, PackedSVT, NumElems);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2997"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a320898056eadc3254fc601e1362eb9f5">ISD::CONCAT&#95;VECTORS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2998"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(DstVT, Res, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, DAG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
